Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Bob Ojeda (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/25/1985, off Mike Witt (SEA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1985, hitting .526 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,700,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1986, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/6/1987 to a 6-year deal worth $8,100,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1987, hitting .374 with 7 HR, 27 RBI...
Drove in 8 runs against Chicago on 6/21/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/1987, hitting .391 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1987, hitting .356 with 9 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1987, hitting .412 with 4 HR, 23 RBI...
Sets a new season NL-Record for RBI with 120 on 10/3/1987...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis on 7/6/1990...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 4/7/1991...
